short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Injects the AnswerDash script into a site without requiring it to be installed, allowing preview before AnswerDash launch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AnswerDash is a service for providing self-service instant answers on websites. This extension will help you setup and preview AnswerDash on your site before you've included the AnswerDash snippet on your site.
